description: Erection of a rear roof extension; erection of a rear extension at third floor level, over part of the existing back addition; installation of 3no. rooflights following the removal of 2no. existing rooflights, in the front roofslope; removal of existing paint and repointing external front fa√ßade; removal of security bars to the existing window, to the rear elevation at first floor level; installation of double glazed timber windows to replace all existing; erection of a glass flat roof to replace existing pitched roof and rooflights above existing single storey side extension; alterations to the rear elevation at ground floor level to include, installation of 3no. French doors following the removal of an existing French door to the rear elevation; demolition of existing single storey rear structure, to the rear of existing single storey rear extension; excavation of the front and part of the rear garden to form lightwells, in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
